org.epochx.life
Interface Listener

All Known Subinterfaces:
ConfigListener, CrossoverListener, ElitismListener, GenerationListener, Hook, InitialisationListener, MutationListener, PoolSelectionListener, ReproductionListener, RunListener
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractHook, ConfigAdapter, ConfigOperator, CrossoverAdapter, CrossoverManager, DepthFirstMapper, ElitismAdapter, ElitismManager, FitnessProportionateSelector, FixedLengthInitialiser, FixedPointCrossover, FullInitialiser, FullInitialiser, FullInitialiser, GenerationAdapter, GenerationManager, GrowInitialiser, GrowInitialiser, GrowInitialiser, InitialisationAdapter, InitialisationManager, KozaCrossover, LinearRankSelector, MutationAdapter, MutationManager, OnePointCrossover, OnePointCrossover, PointMutation, PointMutation, PoolSelectionAdapter, PoolSelectionManager, RampedHalfAndHalfInitialiser, RampedHalfAndHalfInitialiser, RampedHalfAndHalfInitialiser, RandomSelector, ReproductionAdapter, ReproductionManager, RunAdapter, RunManager, SinglePointMutation, StandardGenerator, SubtreeCrossover, SubtreeMutation, TournamentSelector, WhighamCrossover, WhighamMutation
public interface Listener

A marker interface that indicates an interface forms part of a listener pattern. This interface has no methods that are required to be implemented.
